messages.subject: Off Topic - My goodbye for now
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Unschoolers.  I know I dropped off the face of the earth.  I ve been reading every message that comes through, but couldn t reply via my HLSelden@comcast
messages.messageBody:
Hi Unschoolers. I know I dropped off the face of the earth. I've
been reading every message that comes through, but couldn't reply
via my HLSelden@comcast address.

A lot of changes are going on right now.

The long and short of it is, I came out of the closet, I am getting
a divorce and I currently have custody of 2 of the 3 kids.

This was not an easy decision, but in the long run, I feel it's best
for all of us.

I'm going to stop the posts from coming to that inbox for now as I
only check it once a week.

When things settle down, perhaps I'll return to regular posting. In
the meantime, the kids are doing well and my roomates are both very
supportive of Unschooling. They have two children with a "One in a
million" genetic skin disorder who have teachers come in 3 times a
week. So we're thinking of getting them on the unschooling
bandwagon and out of the "schoolish" mode.

Hope you are all well and hope to see you again soon.

Holly
